Function that takes a lavaan model with standardized parameters returns a list with model caracteristics

Source: R/main.R
sim_standardized_matrices.Rd

Function that takes a lavaan model with standardized parameters returns a list with model caracteristics

sim_standardized_matrices(m, max_iterations = 100)

Arguments

m

Structural model represented by lavaan Syntax
max_iterations

Maximum number of iterations before the algorithm fails

Value

list of path and covariance coefficients

Examples

# lavaan model
m = "Latent_1 =~ 0.8 * Ob_1 + 0.8 * Ob_2"

sim_standardized_matrices(m)
#> $RAM_matrices
#> $RAM_matrices$A
#>          Ob_1 Ob_2 Latent_1
#> Ob_1        0    0      0.8
#> Ob_2        0    0      0.8
#> Latent_1    0    0      0.0
#> 
#> $RAM_matrices$S
#>          Ob_1 Ob_2 Latent_1
#> Ob_1     0.36 0.00        0
#> Ob_2     0.00 0.36        0
#> Latent_1 0.00 0.00        1
#> 
#> $RAM_matrices$filter_matrix
#>          Ob_1 Ob_2 Latent_1
#> Ob_1        1    0        0
#> Ob_2        0    1        0
#> Latent_1    0    0        0
#> 
#> $RAM_matrices$iA
#>          Ob_1 Ob_2 Latent_1
#> Ob_1        1    0      0.8
#> Ob_2        0    1      0.8
#> Latent_1    0    0      1.0
#> 
#> 
#> $Correlations
#> $Correlations$R
#>          Ob_1 Ob_2 Latent_1
#> Ob_1     1.00 0.64      0.8
#> Ob_2     0.64 1.00      0.8
#> Latent_1 0.80 0.80      1.0
#> 
#> $Correlations$R_all
#>                         Ob_1      Ob_2  Latent_1     e_Ob_1     e_Ob_2
#> Ob_1               1.0000000 0.6400000 0.8000000  0.6000000  0.0000000
#> Ob_2               0.6400000 1.0000000 0.8000000  0.0000000  0.6000000
#> Latent_1           0.8000000 0.8000000 1.0000000  0.0000000  0.0000000
#> e_Ob_1             0.6000000 0.0000000 0.0000000  1.0000000  0.0000000
#> e_Ob_2             0.0000000 0.6000000 0.0000000  0.0000000  1.0000000
#> Latent_1_FS        0.9055385 0.9055385 0.8834522  0.3312946  0.3312946
#> e_Ob_1_FS          0.7683749 0.0000000 0.3748170  0.7808688 -0.4997560

#> e_Ob_2               0.3312946 -0.4997560  0.7808688          0.3312946
#> Latent_1_FS          1.0000000  0.4242641  0.4242641          1.0000000
#> e_Ob_1_FS            0.4242641  1.0000000 -0.6400000          0.4242641
#> e_Ob_2_FS            0.4242641 -0.6400000  1.0000000          0.4242641
